scripts.run: cucumber-js --require-module dotenv/config --order random -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:output/cucumber_report.json --require 'src/**/*.js' features/**/*.feature --tags 'not @ignore' --tags 'not @wip'
scripts.wip: cucumber-js --require-module dotenv/config --order random -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:output/cucumber_report.json --require 'src/**/*.js' features/**/*.feature --tags @wip
